EmailTemplate.name: Direct-To February 2020.202002_Direct-To_Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: Direct-To Business Aviation Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PILOT INFORMATION The new IntuVue RDR-7000 is the most technically advanced radar available. Download our white paper for pilots: Download <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/learn/products/weather-radar/white-papers/N61-2403-000-000_Superior-Weather-Awareness-with-Less-Stress.pdf?download=true]]> Now that the European Aeronautical Telecommunication Network Baseline 1 mandate is in effect (as of February 5, 2020), many people are trying to understand what’s going on in the world of ATN. Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/01/cpdlc-issues-in-europe?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> By understanding the logic behind how the FMS operates, pilots will get a better idea of how FMS pages are formatted and populated, as well as see how the aircraft executes instructions and complies with settings.Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/01/inside-the-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Primus Elite Advanced Features (PEAF) Upgrade. Night Mode adjusts the chart display to a darker set of colors, providing better contrast when charts are viewed in low lighting. Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/01/peaf-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
MAINTENANCE SECTION Onsite with Field Service Engineer David Melanson in sunny Southern California. Read more <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/L002XI00M0c80QI000q0G0Z]]> Honeywell strives to make it fast, seamless and extremely easy for customers to do business with us. Read more <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/iJ8Q0ZIM0dq00G000002X00]]>
MANAGEMENT NEWS The Cessna Citation Longitude is powered by the highly efficient and reliable HTF7000 powerplant. Electric power is provided by the 36-150 auxiliary power unit. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/supported-platforms/business-jet/textron-aviation/citation-longitude?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Listen to Aerospace Unplugged, Honeywell’s podcast for aircraft owners, operators, technicians and pilots. Read more <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02eZ00K800M0Q000XIG0q0]]> Flying into mountainous locations demands acute situational awareness. Learn why the Primus Elite Synthetic Vision system is so important to Capt. Carlos Alberto de Azevedo. Read more <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/XGq00LI0Z000X800002MQf0]]>
<[[https://www.aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/02/the-future-of-business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> © 2020 Honeywell International Inc.
